english.segment1: So here we are were standing face to face. And yet we seem to be a million miles apart. This world can feel like such a lonely place. It all depends on what you see from where you are. So please, please tell me what you can cause I want to understand
english.segment2: Chorus: How does it look from your side. How does it look from where you are. How does it look from your side, from your side of the world
english.segment3: So tell me the color of your sky above. Paint me a picture of the things that make you smile. Show me your fears and what youre dreaming of. Take me to where my heart can see across the miles. So please, please tell me what you can cause I want to understand
english.segment5: Bridge: Dont be surprised to find that Im not too far away. Cause what we are both in search of is one and the same. So please please tell me what you see. Cause I really want to be the one who understands
